participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I work long hours to support my family. I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia. I have a collection of video games. I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade. I remember helping my mom bake cupcakes in the kitchen when I was a kid.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and thoughtful, values time with friends and family.
participant_2.background: I enjoy celebrating Thanksgiving with my friends in Chicago. I went to the movies with my family and watched a movie about a teacher who inspired her students to be the best they could be. My mother is a librarian. I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days. My cat Sherlock and I love to watch mystery movies together.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well too, thanks!  I'm a big fan of comic books and I have a collection of video games.  Have you ever been to a comic con?
No, but I have always wanted to go!  I have a friend who goes every year and she always has a great time.  What was your favorite comic book series?
My favorite comic book series is "The Walking Dead".  I met the creators of the series at a comic con in Russia and it was an amazing experience!
That is so cool!  I have heard great things about "The Walking Dead".  I am more of a Marvel fan myself.  I love the X-Men!
The X-Men are great!  I love the characters and the stories.  My favorite X-Man is Wolverine.
Wolverine is a great character!  I love his claws and his healing factor.  He is so badass!
He is, isn't he?  Have you seen the new "Logan" movie?
No, I haven't had a chance to see it yet.  I heard it was really good though.
It was!  It is one of my favorite superhero movies of all time!  You should definitely see it when you get a chance.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
